meanings.definition: The action of damaging the appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The defacement of the statue was a sad sight.
meanings.sent2: Graffiti is a common form of defacement on public property.
meanings.sent3: The defacement of the cake with too much frosting made it look like a messy art project.
meanings.sent4: The defacement of the once beautiful landscape by the storm left a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The defacement of the historic building was a stark reminder of the passage of time.

meanings.definition: The act of disfiguring or vandalizing something.
meanings.sent1: The defacement of the park benches with graffiti was disappointing.
meanings.sent2: The defacement of the school walls with spray paint was quickly cleaned up.
meanings.sent3: The defacement of the library book with doodles made it unique in a strange way.
meanings.sent4: The defacement of the old tree by carvings told a story of past visitors.
meanings.sent5: The defacement of the historic monument with political slogans caused a stir in the community.
